branch_steps: Open airway using Head Tilt Chin Lift Prepare Suction.

Consider plastic airway
GIVE 15 liters/min
OXYGEN via free flow mask.
Place in Recovery Position and keep warm with blanket.
Monitor and evacuate, slightly head down.
Administer 1 sea sickness pill - Patient sucks or chews tablet - Patient must be older than 10 years.
Place in a well ventilated area but keep warm.
Focus on horizon or encourage sleep.
